Description:
Detects when an attacker tries to disable User Account Control (UAC) by setting the registry value "EnableLUA" to 0.


Author: frack113
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: UAC Disabled
Query: sourcetype like 'windows-%' eql select * from _source_ where target_object like '%\microsoft\windows\currentversion\policies\system\enablelua%' and details = 'dword (0x00000000)'
